name: White Distressed Dresser-Bureau
description: This lovingly restored piece has been painted with Old White chalk paint and distressed in places to highlight the wonderful carved detailing. It has been finished with wax and aged in places using dark wax to give it a real vintage feel. The bureau lid drops down to reveal the fantastic drawers and shelves inside. Both the top cupboard and bureau lock securely with a vintage style scroll key.

name: Black Retro Telephone Table
description: This retro telephone table has been painted black and is distressed on edges and the legs to reveal white and finished with wax. It has a quirky pull out memory slide with the original board and the seat has been recovered with a monochromatic, geometric fabric. The seat slides back underneath when you've finished those lengthy telephone calls.  This piece is a cool and functional little chap.

name: Vintage Style Book Case
description: This upcycled book case has been painted Country Grey and is distressed along edges to reveal graphite beneath. The back of this book case has been covered with a vintage style designer wall paper which has then been varnished but durability. The rest of the book case is finished with wax.

name: Vintage Style Standing Lamp
description: The stand is solid wood and has been painted with white chalk paint, then distressed to reveal black beneath and finished with wax. The lampshade is also upcycled and was first recovered with black fabric and then lace.

name: Antique Rocking Chair
description: This lovingly restored Victorian Rocking Chair has been painted cream and has been distressed in areas to reveal the original wood beneath. The cushion has been hand stitched and is specifically designed to fit the shape of the seat.

name: Distressed Hall Table
description:
This slender french hall table was painted with Paloma chalk paint and distressed to reveal white beneath. 

As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of ageing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email.

Product sizes are approximate and may vary by 1-2cm.

Width 69cm
Height 69 cm
Depth 49 cm

weight 7.5kg

Deliver: Parcel force express 48

name: Chalkhill- Upcycled Black Square Mirror
description:
Named after The Chalkhill Blue butterfly this mirror has been Upcycled using soil and twigs. It has been painted black then highlighted with duckegg blue.

33cm x 33cm, fitted with picture wire for wall hanging.

As the mirror glass in Chalkhill is pre-loved it is showing slight signs of tarnishing and we are happy to send you further images via email if you are considering purchasing this piece.

By choosing to buy an Upcycled Mirror you are helping to reduce landfill as Mirror glass is not able to be recycled. Pre-loved mirror glass my have fine blemish's or show signs of ageing [often barely noticeable] but by opting to buy upcycled artwork you are helping to support sustainability.

Delivery: Royal Mail, Standard Delivery £8 postage

name: Heart Wall Hanging- Red&Blue
description:
This heart wall hanging is made from soil and leaves and is paintedBlue then highlighted with white. It is wrapped in string and hangs from string also. A lovely vintage key hangs at the centre, 

20cm x 20cm

All Woodland Wall Hangings are for interior display only.
They should not be displayed in bathrooms, or rooms that have a lot of moisture. Keep away from naked flames.

Delivery: Royal Mail Standard delivery, £5 postage.

name: Beech Leaf Photo Frame
description:
This Upcycled photo frame is made from soil and beech leaves and has a frosting of white paint. The frame would ideally suit a 5 x 7 inch photograph and has fittings to be hung on the wall [portrait.]

Delivery: Royal Mail, Standard delivery, postage £4

name: Large Heart Wall Hanging-Blue&White
description:
This large heart wall hanging is made from soil and leaves and is painted Louis Blue then highlighted with white. It is wrapped in string and hangs from string also.

26cm x 26cm 

All Woodland Wall Hangings are for interior display only.
They should not be displayed in bathrooms, or rooms that have a lot of moisture.  Keep away from naked flames.

Delivery: Royal Mail Standard delivery, £5 postage.

name: Black and Silver Photoframe
description:
This textured little upcycled photo frame is made from soil, fallen twigs and leaves and is for a standard 4x6 inch photograph. 

Delivery: Royal Mail, Standard Delivery, £4.

name: Valerian- Upcycled White Mirror
description:
Valerian is named after an American herb with white flowers. It is made from soil and twigs and had been frosted with white paint. 

34cm x 39cm

Due to the delicate nature of this particular item we are not able to deliver Valerian via courier at this time and so we are only able to deliver to customers living within a 40 mile radius of Garstang, lancashire. There is a £25 fee for delivery.

For customers who wish to pick up this item please order via telephone. Visit our F.A.Q page and read 'Can I pick up and item?' for full details.

name: Isla Gold- Upcycled Square Gold Mirror
description:
Isla Gold is and Upcycled mirror thats had been made using soil, twigs and fallen leaves. Painted gold this mirror is 55cm x 55cm and is strung at the back so it can be wall hung. 
 
By choosing to buy an Upcycled Mirror you are helping to reduce landfill as Mirror glass is not able to be recycled. Pre-loved mirror glass my have fine blemish's or show signs of ageing [often barely noticeable] but by opting to buy upcycled artwork you are helping to support sustainability.

name: Mellifera-Black and Silver Hexagonal Mirror
description:
Mellifera is named after the European Dark Bee bee (Apis mellifera mellifera) It is an Upcycled Mirror made from soil and fallen twigs. Painted black and highlighted in silver this very textured Woodland mirror is large, dramatic and would make a fabulous addition to any living space. 

Diameter 67cm

As the mirror glass in Mellifera is pre-loved it has a very fine blemish and we are happy to send you images via email if you are considering purchasing this piece.

By choosing to buy an Upcycled Mirror you are helping to reduce landfill as Mirror glass is not able to be recycled. Pre-loved mirror glass my have fine scratches or blemish's [often barely noticeable] but by opting to buy upcycled artwork you are helping to support sustainability.

name: Heno de Oro- Upcycled Round Mirror
description:
Created with the straw from a Christmas hamper, this circular mirror also incorporates soil and has been sponged with gold paint, hence its name Heno de Oro which is the Spanish translation for Gold Straw.

Heno de Oro has a very fine blemish and we are happy to send you images via email if you are considering purchasing this piece.

Due to the delicate nature of this particular item we are not able to deliver Heno De oro via courier at this time and so we are only able to deliver to customers living within a 40 mile radius of Garstang, lancashire. There is a £25 fee for delivery.

For customers who wish to pick up this item please order via telephone.  Visit our F.A.Q page and read 'Can I pick up and item?' for full details. 

For more detailed information about Woodland Mirrors please read terms and conditions.

name: Toile De Jouy 3D Frame
description:
This upcycled 3D frame contains a stylish Toile De Jouy image of a couple embracing. The frame has been painted with Louis Blue chalk paint and then has been covered in lace. It is fitted to be wall hung. 

[Please not this item has been sealed, it is not designed to change the image contained inside.]

Delivery: Royal Mail, Standard Delivery, £4 postage

name: Paris Grey Upcycled Telephone Table Seat
description: This hand-painted Telephone Table Seat has a distinctly Monastic feel. After being painted Paris Grey a dry brush effect in white was added to give it depth. The interior of this piece is grey and white and the handle is white with a wash of silver. The seat was re-covered with tasteful, floral upholstery fabric in silver. As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of age-ing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email. Product sizes are approximate and may vary by 1-2cm. Click here to watch this product being created. Height 76cm Width 85cm Depth 43 cm Weight 30kg Delivery: Parcel force express A.M

name: Upcycled Dresser- White and Chateaux Grey distressed
description:
This lovely reproduction dresser was originally made in the 1970's and was ready for re-vamping.  The dresser is painted in Chateaux grey and white. Chateaux Grey is a very green-grey, a pale khaki colour. Inside the dresser there is a white shelf that has been finished in dark wax and the sides and bottom have been painted Chateaux grey also. One of the drawers has partitions inside for cutlery and has a green felt bottom. 

Additional images of this piece are available on request.

As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of age-ing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email.


Delivered by Veelou

name: Little Jadis- Silver Upcycled Mirror
description:
Named after Narnia's White Witch, Little Jadis is an Upcycled frame that is made from soil and bark. Painted white with shades of silver and grey, this theatrical mirror sparkles in the light and would add a wonderful woodland element to any home.

29cm x 37cm

Delivery: Royal Mail, Standard delivery, £8 postage

name: Green French Hall Table- Upcycled
description:
This slender french hall table was painted persian green and then finished with dark wax to make it a deep, rich green. On distressed areas paint layers of black and white peep through giving it a real Flea Market feel and if you're looking for  the rich tones associated with Moroccan or Bazaar styled interiors; this table is the perfect addition.

As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of ageing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email. 

Product sizes are approximate and may vary by 1-2cm. 

Width 69cm
Height 71 cm
Depth 42 cm

weight 7kg

Deliver: Parcel force express 48

name: Chateux Grey Distressed Mirror- Hand painted
description:
This solid pine mirror frame has been painted in chateux grey and duck egg blue. It has been distressed to reveal a matt black finish beneath which picks out the lovely grain of the wood, and finished with wax. 

Width 54cm
Height 63.5 cm

name: Distressed Nest of tables- Upcycled
description:
A chic, solid oak nest of tables hand painted white and distressed to reveal a bold, matt black finish beneath. The wood of this lovingly ucycled piece is also visible in places, hinting at its previous incarnation. This set is very textured and is finished with wax. 

A wonderful addition to any vintage style living room.

As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of age-ing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email. 

Product sizes are approximate and may vary by 1-2cm. 

Larger table:   width 42cm, depth 32cm, height 47.5 cm
Smaller table:  width 28.5 cm, depth 28.5cm, height 41 cm

Combined Weight: 7kg

Delivery Parcel Force express 48

name: Hand painted Shabby Chic Blue Chest of Drawers
description:
These lovely pine drawers are painted Louis blue and finished with wax. Along edges and on the top white shows through where it has been distressed and the handles are painted with a white wash giving the piece a distinctly coastal cottage style. 

Width 81 cm
Depth 40 cm
Height 90 cm

name: Plaid Nest of Corner Tables- Upcycled
description:
This little trio of tables are painted in white, chateux grey, country grey and duck egg blue. The plaid design and distressed paint work makes them perfect for any home in need of some cottage chic. 

As a pre-loved piece of furniture this item may show some signs of age-ing. If you have any queries or would like to see additional images please contact us by email.

Depth  31.5cm
Height 42.3 cm 

Weight 4kg

name: White and Black Distressed Mirror- Upcycled
description: Crying out to be upcycled, this large pine frame was painted Graphite and then white before being distressed. The knots and wood grain show through beautifully and the whole piece is finished with wax. Bold and stylish this frame compliments both brightly coloured and monochromatic spaces.
